The Quranic researcher will pray a fire that will enter it, not referred to the hereafter, and its freeness is measured, (P-263) and the cinema to affirm the bare and the obedience to the greatness; That is: a great fire.The flame of great and great criticism; It is the fire of hell, and a sentence: What is the richest, etc.And in it is a sense of it and the accusation of what was tried for money and children, and this sentence is a parallel to your life with what appears with him, and he is the same He gained the child, and some of the virtues said: The first is a sign of his work, and this is a sign of the same, and it is also on some of the precedents.
